Generates a grid from max and min coordinates

latlon_grid.Rd

Generates a grid from max and min coordinates

Usage

latlon_grid(
  x_range = c(-180, 180),
  y_range = c(0, 90),
  gridsize = 10,
  crs = 4326,
  ...
)

Arguments

x_range, y_range

two-column vector giving the minimum and maximum coordinates. Unit as implied by crs

gridsize

size of grid points. Unit as implied by crs

crs

Coordinate reference system. Should be parsed by sf::st_crs(). Default is 4326

...

arguments passed to sf::st_make_grid()

Value

sf object

Examples

latlon_grid()
#> Geometry set for 324 features 
#> Geometry type: POINT
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: -175 ymin: 5 xmax: 175 ymax: 85
#> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
#> First 5 geometries:
#> POINT (-175 5)
#> POINT (-165 5)
#> POINT (-155 5)
#> POINT (-145 5)
#> POINT (-135 5)
